name: TurboCAD Drawing Lock File
summary: Learn about .DWL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: TurboCAD creates DWL files when a drawing file is opened. They are automatically deleted when the drawing is closed.

description: A DWL file is a lock file created by TurboCAD, a program used to draft 2D and 3D designs. It stores lock information when a drawing (.TCW file) is currently opened in the program. DWL files are used for preventing simultaneous access to a drawing, which may cause the file to become corrupted.
